name: 2018/11/07 Red Cabbage and Bellpepper in Tomato Puree
description: This delicious recipe for Red Cabbage and Bellpepper in Tomato Puree is perfect for those looking for a healthy, low-carb, low-sodium, and low-sugar meal. It's a wonderful addition to your collection of healthy recipes, designed to bring vibrant colors and flavors to your table while keeping your nutrition in check.

recipeInstructions.text: Thinly slice the 200g of red cabbage.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the 57g of orange bell pepper into thin strips.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Grate the 15g of cheddar cheese and set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: In a skillet over medium heat, cook the cabbage and bell pepper with the 0.25 cup of tomato puree until the vegetables are tender, about 10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Serve hot, garnishing with the grated cheddar cheese on top.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5
